participant_1.background:
I love that my job allows me to help animals in need.
I keep a journal of my memories to help me remember how I used to feel when I was younger.
I wear bright colors and patterns to make me feel more confident and energetic.
I'm planning to take my dog to the park this weekend.
I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult.

participant_2.background:
I don't own a car because I value my time and prefer to take public transportation or walk to restaurants.
i just bought a new house with my partner.
My biggest fear is that I will work myself up so much that I will become ill.
I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park.
I do my best in school, and I love to dance with my team when I have free time.

content.text: Hello! I'm a dog groomer and I love my job! I love that I get to help animals in need.  What do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher and I love my job too! I love working with kids and helping them learn.  What kind of dog do you have?
I have a goldendoodle named Buddy. He's the sweetest dog ever!  I take him to the park every weekend.  What do you do for fun?
I love to dance! I'm on a dance team with my friends.  I also love to go to the park with my partner.  We just bought a new house together.
That sounds like so much fun! I love dancing too.  I'm glad you have a great job and a good partner.  What are your biggest fears?
My biggest fear is that I'll work myself up too much and become ill.  I try to take care of myself by eating healthy and getting enough sleep.
That's a good fear to have.  It's important to take care of yourself.  I'm glad you're doing a good job of it.
